pr_title: Add convenience method for getting assignment during aggregation pushdown

timeline.bodyText: nit: this method/interface doesn't seem to have the concept of a "variable" visible to it. So may be use verifyNotNull(columnHandle, "Column not found for %s", name); or keep the verifyNotNull out of this method?
timeline.author: phd3

replies.bodyText: Good catch. Changed to No assignment for %s
replies.author: findepi
